meta.title: Charter Schools, Arts-Infused Program | Lighthouse Academies

meta.name: description
meta.content: Lighthouse Academies is a network of charter schools that takes a restorative approach to education. Visit our website to learn how we are making a difference.
Lighthouse Academies is a network of charter schools that takes a restorative approach to education. Visit our website to learn how we are making a difference.
Charter Schools, Arts-Infused Program | Lighthouse Academies

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme12

section.class: fsElement fsMedia fsPlayer universal-slideshow hero-treatment fsSingleItem

div.div: Lighthouse Academies is a network of public charter schools in New York, Indiana and Arkansas, providing opportunities for children to discover, achieve, and prepare for success in college, career, and life.

p.a: We instill in our scholars not just the curiosity and work ethic required to enrich their minds today, but the independence and tenacity needed to succeed in college and beyond. Enroll your child today!

We know that great teachers inspire great dreams. Join our team as we use our passion for creativity and innovation to transform communities through quality public education. Learn more and apply today!
We believe all children can achieve at high levels and deserve access to excellent public schools. If your community is seeking transformative public education, contact us today!

div.p: Lighthouse scholars are immersed in a college-driven community from the moment they walk through our doors. We prepare our scholars academically, socially, and emotionally to take their education to higher levels. We set and stay the course to college—whether in the kindergarten classroom cheering for the state football team or the high school upperclassman enrolled in an online college course, every course, classroom, and goal leads to college.

Fact: Every relationship requires effort. Our scholars learn critical life skills designed to teach them how to positively interact with their peers, families, and authority figures; resolve conflict; and set boundaries. Every staff member serves as a model of these behaviors as they guide and mentor our young people through this process.

Each Lighthouse charter school serves a community with a distinct set of needs. We do not subscribe to a “one size fits all” mentality. Decisions such as curriculum and extracurricular programs should fit the personality of the school community, and nobody knows the community better than the local administration. Our educators are empowered to use innovative teaching approaches to engage and motivate scholars at all levels and in any environment.

Preparing young people for a future full of opportunities requires educators to understand the world our scholars are stepping into. At Lighthouse Academies, we’re all learners, and there’s no limit to what we are capable of when we have knowledge. We encourage regular participation in and provide our staff members with career development and personal enrichment opportunities, because we are all on a continuous quest for higher education.

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList module fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_15

img.alt: Indiana charter school awarded grant funding from ACR/JAMS Foundation

article.div: Indiana charter school awarded grant funding from ACR/JAMS Foundation

div.p: Lighthouse Academies’ Gary, Indiana college prep academy for grades 9-12 will be awarded $60,000 in funding over a two-year period from the Association for Conflict Resolution (ACR) and the JAMS Foundation (JAMS).

img.alt: Lighthouse Academies Announces Formation of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship for Lighthouse Scholars

article.div: Lighthouse Academies Announces Formation of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship for Lighthouse Scholars

div.p: Lighthouse Academies today announced the establishment of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship. Three Lighthouse Academies graduating seniors will each receive a one thousand dollar scholarship from the fund.

img.alt: Four Gary Lighthouse Preparatory Academy Students Graduate with Both High School Diplomas and Associates Degrees

article.div: Four Gary Lighthouse Preparatory Academy Students Graduate with Both High School Diplomas and Associates Degrees

div.p: For four students of the Gary Lighthouse College Preparatory Academy, graduation day was doubly sweet. In addition to earning high school diplomas, they each also were awarded associate degrees from Ivy Tech Community College of Indiana.

article.div: U.S. News & World Report Awards Bronze Medals to Gary Lighthouse Charter School

div.p: Gary Lighthouse Charter School and Indianapolis Lighthouse Charter School each are recognized by U.S. News & World Report in its annual national ranking of top performing schools for 2018. The rankings are based on each school’s performance on state-required tests and how well they prepare students for college. Both schools earned Bronze medals. More than 20,000 schools from across the 50 states and the District of Columbia were included in the analysis and rankings.

img.alt: Ivy Tech's Honors Program gives top students a boost

article.div: Ivy Tech's Honors Program gives top students a boost

div.p: For Joy Spence, the Ivy Honors program at Ivy Tech Community College was a chance to learn what NOT to do in college.

img.alt: How a gritty Midwestern city is emerging as a model for civility

article.div: How a gritty Midwestern city is emerging as a model for civility

div.p: Gary, Ind., hosts World Civility Day on Thursday, drawing attendees from as far afield as Kenya as part of an ongoing campaign that has boosted not only civility but also the city’s own self-image.

div.div: 29140 Chapel Park Drive, Building 5-A Wesley Chapel, FL 33543
